mapper.sql: id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag, order_id, sku_id,parent_id,description_start_level, ship_start_level,attitude_start_level,content,picture
mapper.select: select a.photo as icon,a.name as nick_name,b.content,b.picture,b.id,ROUND((b.attitude_start_level+b.description_start_level+b.ship_start_level)/3) as startLevel ,GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(h.`name`,":",g.`value`)) as sku from um_user a,om_evaluate b,om_order c,pm_goods d,pm_goods_sku e,pm_goods_rel_attribute_value_sku f,pm_goods_attribute_value g,pm_goods_attribute h where isNull(b.parent_id) and b.order_id = c.id and c.um_user_id=a.id and b.sku_id = e.id and d.id = e.goods_id and d.id = #{t.goodsId} and f.goods_sku_id = e.id and f.goods_attribute_value_id = g.id and h.id = g.product_attribute_id group by b.id

select c.name as nickName,c.photo as icon,content,picture,a.id,ROUND((a.attitude_start_level+a.description_start_level+a.ship_start_level)/3) as startLevel from om_evaluate a,om_order b,um_user c where b.id = a.order_id and b.id = #{orderId} and a.sku_id = #{skuId} and b.um_user_id = c.id and isNull(a.parent_id)
